manifest_description.message: Directly reward web producers with Bitcoin Cash and no trusted intermediaries

manifest_default_title.description: The default title of the extension's button in the toolbar

popup_period_back.description: Tooltip for the button taking the user to the previous period

popup_period_forward.description: Tooltip for the button taking the user to the next period

popup_settings.description: Tooltip for the button taking the user to the settings page

popup_toggle_automatic.description: Tooltip for the button that toggles manual state when the entry is manual

popup_toggle_manual.description: Tooltip for the button that toggles manual state when the entry is automatic

popup_ban.description: Tooltip for the button that removes the entry from the list permanently

popup_contribute_label.description: Label for the popup button that takes the user to the contribution page

date_from_to.description: Presents the date range of a period in a user readable way

date_since.description: Presents the start of a period in a user readable way
